definition: to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to plan/to seek/scheme
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy
surname Ce

sentences.english: He has no PR people advising him.
sentences.chinese: 他身邊沒有公關人員替他出謀劃策。

sentences.english: Post a topic, and someone will definitely help you out.
sentences.chinese: 發佈一個主題，絕對會有人給你出謀劃策的。

sentences.english: Friends who have wonderful ideas please don’t be shy and bring forward your suggestions on our group, if you got the talent, don’t waste it.
sentences.chinese: 有好的建議的朋友請在後面跟貼，爲團隊出謀劃策。

sentences.english: Unlike Best and Gascoigne, he has been shrewdly advised.
sentences.chinese: 不同於貝斯特和加斯科因，他身邊一直有人出謀劃策。

sentences.english: The discussions focused on seeking new ideas for a Middle East peace.
sentences.chinese: 本屆會議致力於爲中東和平的實現出謀劃策。

definition: (to act) on one's own initiative
bureaucracy
young and promising
highest common factor HCF/greatest common divisor GCD
to charge and break through enemy lines
hard power (i.e. military and economic power)
(abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
to deceive/to conceal
to offer advice/to make a suggestion
to investigate and plan forward
foothold
think tank/brain trust
to prevail upon/to coax
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
military exercise/army drill
lit. to cross five passes and slay six generals (idiom)/fig. to surmount all difficulties (on the way to success)
pinyin: guo4 wu3 guan1 zhan3 liu4 jiang4
